import sha256 from'crypto-js/sha256';function getHourlyPseudoRandomIdx(length){// Get the current hour, day, month, and year
var now=new Date();var hour=now.getHours();var day=now.getDate();var month=now.getMonth()+1;// Add 1 because getMonth() returns 0-indexed values
var year=now.getFullYear();// Combine the hour, day, month, and year into a string
var inputString="".concat(hour,"-").concat(day,"-").concat(month,"-").concat(year);// Hash the input string using SHA-256
var hash=sha256(inputString);// Convert the hash to an integer 
var hexString=hash.toString();var hashInt=parseInt(hexString.slice(0,8),16);// Get a random index using the hash and the length
var randomIndex=hashInt%length;return randomIndex;}export default getHourlyPseudoRandomIdx;
